algorithm_technique: Bit manipulation to consolidate bits. Count occurrences of each bit across all numbers. Distribute bits greedily to maximize numbers for sum of squares.
problem_summary_simple: Maximize the sum of squares of k chosen numbers after applying bitwise operations.
problem_summary_technical: Consolidate bits using AND/OR operations to create largest possible numbers. Greedily assign bits to form k largest numbers for sum of squares.
key_insights: The bitwise AND and OR operations allow for redistribution of bits among numbers.
The goal is to create the largest possible numbers to maximize the sum of their squares.
A greedy approach based on bit counts can determine the optimal distribution of bits.
